name: Modules.Applesignin
summary: A module to use apple signin functionality.

properties.name: success
properties.summary: Indicates if the user was logged in successfully. Returns true if request succeeded, false otherwise.

properties.name: cancelled
properties.summary: Indicates if the user cancelled the login request by closing the dialog.

properties.name: error
properties.summary: Error message, if any returned. Will be undefined if success is true.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

methods.name: authorize
methods.description: After authorizarion it will fire event login event which tells success or failure of login.

parameters.name: scopes
parameters.summary: The contact information to be requested from the user during authentication. Use the Modules.Applesignin.AUTHORIZATION_SCOPE_* constant values to populate the array.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Applesignin.LoginButton except those marked not-creation or read-only.

methods.name: getCredentialState
methods.summary: Returns the credential state for the given user.
methods.description: This method returns immediately without waiting for tasks to finish. Once a session is invalidated, new tasks cannot be created in the session, but existing tasks continue until completion. Once invalidated, references to the events and callback objects are broken. Session objects cannot be reused. To cancel all outstanding tasks, call invalidateAndCancel instead.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.summary: A string, <Modules.Applesignin.ProfileObject.userId>, associated with the Apple ID that your app receives in login event.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Function to invoke on success or failure.

constants.name: AUTHORIZATION_SCOPE_EMAIL
constants.summary: A scope that includes the user's email address.

constants.name: AUTHORIZATION_SCOPE_FULLNAME
constants.summary: A scope that includes the user's full name.

constants.name: BUTTON_STYLE_WHITE_OUTLINE
constants.summary: Authorization button style white outline. Use with style.

constants.name: CREDENTIAL_STATE_REVOKED
constants.summary: Authorization for the given user has been revoked.

constants.name: USER_DETECTION_STATUS_REAL
constants.summary: The user appears to be a real person.

constants.name: USER_DETECTION_STATUS_UNKNOWN
constants.summary: The system hasn't determined whether the user might be a real person.

constants.name: USER_DETECTION_STATUS_UNSUPPORTED
constants.summary: The system can't determine this user's status as a real person.
